Note: Bus stops will be open on weekends.

https://at.govt.nz/RailRebuild
Rail Network Rebuild Stage 2

Five stations are currently closed on the Eastern Line; Ōrakei, Meadowbank, Glen Innes, Panmure and Sylvia Park due to the Rail Network Rebuild. The Rail Bus East (RBE) is available as an alternative stopping at all closed stations between Britomart and Otahuhu. Express rail bus services are also available during peak travel times from Panmure (RBPX) and Glen Innes (RBGX).

https://at.govt.nz/RailRebuild
Rail Network Rebuild Stage 2

During peak hours, trains will run between Onehunga and Penrose only. Customers will need to transfer to a Southern or Eastern line train at Penrose. At off-peak times including on weekends, trains will travel to Britomart. During the day, trains will not stop at Remuera and Greenlane.
https://at.govt.nz/RailRebuild
Rail Network Rebuild Stage 2

During peak hours, trains will run between Onehunga and Penrose only. Customers will need to transfer to a Southern or Eastern line train at Penrose. At off-peak times including on weekends, trains will travel to Britomart. During the day, trains will not stop at Remuera and Greenlane.
